title: Halloween costume ideas for kids: 10 last-minute fancy dress outfits to make at home in 20 minutes
text:
For many of us, no two words make the blood run cold quite like "fancy dress". And when it comes to Halloween, kitting out one's children has become a frighteningly expensive business, with shops and supermarkets full of ready-made costumes and accessories; Brits spent around £420 million on Halloween last year, an increase of five per cent on the previous year.

But it needn't be such a costly business. Even time-poor parents can whip up an impressive and kid-approved Halloween costume with a bit of imagination and, on the whole, items found around your own home, leaving you plenty of time to do a panic run to Waitrose's sweet aisle - or to nail a killer Halloween make-up look of your own. ...
description: For many of us, no two words make the blood run cold quite like "fancy dress".
